content.text: to promote a summer discount on courses
to announce a school open house
to provide tips for language learning

Advertisement: New Horizons Language School is offering a 20% discount on all evening courses this summer! Whether you're interested in improving your English, Spanish, or French, we have classes that fit your schedule. Our experienced teachers provide engaging and interactive lessons to help you achieve fluency. Enroll by June 15th to take advantage of this special offer. Visit our website or call us at 555-1234 for more details. Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn a new language!

Text Message: Hi Alex, it's Sarah. Just a reminder that our group project meeting is tomorrow at 4 PM in the library. Make sure to bring your notes and any research you've done. We need to finalize our presentation slides and rehearse once or twice. Let me know if you can't make it or if you have any questions. See you there!
